SELECT T.TIMELINE_NO , T.T_CONTENT , T.MEMBER_NO , M.MEMBER_NAME , T.STATUS , T.A_STATUS , A.CHANGE_NAME , TO_CHAR(T.ENROLL_DATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , A1.CHANGE_NAME AS USER_CHANGE_NAME , ROUND((SYSDATE- T.ENROLL_DATE)*24*60*60) AS SEC , ROUND((SYSDATE- T.ENROLL_DATE)*24*60) AS MIN , ROUND((SYSDATE- T.ENROLL_DATE)*24) AS HOUR , ROUND((SYSDATE- T.ENROLL_DATE)) AS DAY FROM TIMELINE T LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.DIVISION = T.TIMELINE_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A1 ON(A1.DIVISION = T.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE T.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY T.ENROLL_DATE DESC
